document_data.name: Vale of the Reaver
document_data.mainbody: The '''Vale of the Reaver''' was a valley located in the [[Vilhon Reach]] named for its occupancy of devout followers of [[Garagos]], the Reaver. Compared to the oldest [[House of Steel]], the Vale was the largest or most prominent center of [[Church of Garagos|Garagathan]] faith as of the mid-14<sup>th</sup> century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: The valley was located near the headwaters of the [[Thornwash River]] between the [[Thornwood]] and the western edge of the [[Cloven Mountains]]. It was located north of [[Saelmur]] and [[Ankhapur]] and south of the [[Deepwash]].
document_data.Activities: [[Ounadar]] the Blood-Drenched rose to power in this region, attracting followers to Garagos that included [[berserker]]s, criminals, and [[half-orc]] savages. They represented the largest gathering of Garagos' faithful in [[Faer√ªn]] as of [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Nearby caves housed several captured [[deepspawn]] that Garagos' followers used to practice their savagery.
